title: What time does worlds start
body: Does anyone know what time the first game of worlds will be

replies.body: I got that from the Esports section in the banner at the top here. To the left of Boards.

Group Stage: September 29-October 2 + October 6-9 at the Bill Graham Civic Auditorium in San Francisco, CA
Quarterfinals: October 13-16 at The Chicago Theatre in Chicago, IL
Semifinals: October 21-22 at Madison Square Garden in New York, NY
Finals: October 29 at Staples Center in Los Angeles, CA

But that's dates.
What time it starts would depend on where you live.

thanks man
did you know what time it started in San Francisco
